name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MNgo Notes: Text Notes & To Dos

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A notes Web App & Chrome Extension to write in. Can be used to maintain to dos and texts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A notes Web App & Chrome Extension to write in. 
Can be used to increase productivity during work, working online on browser by directly opening this extension and writing/pasting texts/data here.
Can be used to maintain to-dos and texts.
